projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, user authentication, and real-time inventory management. Implemented microservices architecture for scalability.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Built a collaborative task management application with real-time updates using WebSockets. Features include drag-and-drop interface, team collaboration, and analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: Created a responsive weather application that provides real-time weather data and 7-day forecasts using external APIs. Implemented geolocation features and offline caching.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Designed and developed an analytics platform for social media metrics with data visualization, automated reports, and ML-based insights for engagement optimization.

courses.title: Docker and Kubernetes: The Complete Guide

achievements.title: Hackathon Winner - TechCon 2023
achievements.description: First place in regional coding competition with a team of 4, building an AI-powered resume optimization tool in 24 hours.

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor
achievements.description: Active contributor to React.js and Node.js open source projects with over 50 merged pull requests.

achievements.title: Tech Speaker
achievements.description: Delivered presentation on 'Modern Web Development Practices' at Regional Developer Conference 2023, attended by 200+ developers.

achievements.title: Employee of the Quarter
achievements.description: Recognized for exceptional performance and leading the successful migration of legacy systems to microservices architecture.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.description: Lead development of enterprise web applications, mentor junior developers, and architect scalable solutions using MERN stack. Reduced application load time by 40% through optimization.
Developed and maintained multiple web applications for clients. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions on time and within budget.
Built custom websites and web applications for small businesses and startups. Managed complete project lifecycle from requirements gathering to deployment and maintenance.

resumeData.summary: Sarah Johnson is a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Python, Docker, AWS, Git, REST APIs, GraphQL, Tailwind CSS, Jest. With hands-on experience in 4 projects and 3 positions of professional experience, Sarah demonstrates continuous learning through 6 completed courses and has earned 4 notable achievements. Known for delivering high-quality solutions and staying current with industry trends.
